Class AIWaitWithBlock

    An AI task to wait with a block

                       net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving entityIn,

        An AI task to wait with a block

        Parameters:
        findBlock - The class AIFindBlock attached to entityIn
        entityIn - The EntityLiving this task is applied to
        executeCheck - A check performed before this task is executed
        waitFor - A length of time to wait for
        postWait - A lambda called when the entityIn has finished waiting
